name: Light Armor
desc: Basic armor, covering only the most vital areas on your body.

name: Medium Armor
effect: Equip one piece of _Layered Armor_ as a part of this. They share _Durability_ and all Keywords with this.
desc: Standard armor, striking a balance between load and durability.

name: Heavy Armor
effect: Equip two pieces of _Layered Armor_ as a part of this. They share _Durability_ and all Keywords with this.
desc: Heavy armor, sacrificing mobility for additional effects.

name: Gambeson
effect: While wearing this Armor you have +2 _Block_ against _Crush_ _Damage_.

abilities.name: Twist
abilities.special: You may use this even if you did not qualify for a _Gambit_ or as an extra _Gambit_ by _Notching_ your _Armor_.

desc: Thick, quilted armor specialized in defending against crushing strikes.

name: Reinforced Armor
desc: Additional padding and reinforcements that, while not providing a specific defense, generally improves the efficacy of the armor.

name: Chain Shirt
effect: While wearing this Armor you have 2 _Ward_ (Slash).

abilities.name: Armored Deflection
abilities.trigger: You are hit by a _Slash_ effect.
abilities.effect: Gain _Resistance_ [_Slash_]. You may choose to use this _Reaction_ at no _Cost_; if you do, roll a d6. On a 3 or lower, lose 1 _Durability_.

name: Traveler's Boots
desc: Sturdy boots made for traveling the world.

abilities.name: Walking Shoes
abilities.effect: On each day of Travel, roll a d6. On a 5 or higher you may remove a _Fatigue_ stake, including automatic ones.

name: Iron Boots
desc: Solid boots protect against hostile terrain and make it easier to travel the world.

abilities.name: Walking Shoes
abilities.effect: On each day of Travel, roll a d6. On a 6, you may remove a _Fatigue_ stake, including automatic ones.

abilities.name: Iron Soles
abilities.effect: Reduce the Damage by 2 for all _Terrain_ effects you step on.

name: Iron Helmet
desc: A sturdy helmet that can be difference between a glancing blow and a lethal strike.

name: Traveler's Cloak
desc: A thick relatively waterproof cloak that, while not specialized, is useful for a wide variety of climates.

abilities.name: Cloaked Protection
abilities.effect: When traveling through harsh weather, roll a d6. On a 4 or less, you may demote a single _Affliction_ or _Fatigue_ Hazard related to said Weather. On a 5 or higher, instead remove it.

name: Metal Body
desc: A metal form that is not dominated by any specific metal, though it still provides significant armor.
effect: While wearing this Armor treat your _Block_ as 2 higher against _Crush_, _Slash_, and _Stab_ Damage.

abilities.name: Twist
abilities.special: You may use this even if you did not qualify for a _Gambit_ or as an extra _Gambit_ by _Notching_ this.

name: Stone Body
desc: A resilient form made from a mix of various stones and earthen elements.
effect: While wearing this Armor treat your _Block_ as 3 higher against _Slash_ and _Stab_ Damage.

abilities.name: Twist
abilities.special: You may use this even if you did not qualify for a _Gambit_ or as an extra _Gambit_ by _Notching_ this.

name: Copper Body
desc: A metal form that is not dominated by any specific metal, though it still provides significant armor.
effect: While wearing this Armor treat your _Block_ as 2 higher against _Lightning_ Damage.

abilities.name: Conduct
abilities.effect: Gain _Resistance_ to the Attack. All creatures _Engaged_ with you take 2 _Lighting_ Damage.
abilities.special: You may use this even if you did not qualify for a _Gambit_ or as an extra _Gambit_ by _Notching_ this.

name: Metal Body
desc: A metal form that is not dominated by any specific metal, though it still provides significant armor.
effect: While wearing this Armor treat your _Block_ as 2 higher against _Crush_, _Slash_, and _Stab_ Damage.

abilities.name: Twist
abilities.effect: Gain 4 _Block_, or 5 _Block_ if this triggered off of Armored Rebuke.
abilities.special: You may use this even if you did not qualify for a _Gambit_ or as an extra _Gambit_ by _Notching_ this.

name: Iron Plating
desc: Heavy plates in strategic places, providing an extra layer of protection.

name: Light Natural Armor
desc: Natural armor, whether that be chitin, a thin shell, or natural plating.

name: Medium Natural Armor
desc: Natural armor, whether that be chitin, a thin shell, or natural plating.

name: Shell

abilities.name: Twist
abilities.effect: Gain 3 _Block_, or 4 _Block_ if this triggered off of Deflect.
abilities.special: You may use this even if you did not qualify for a _Gambit_ or as an extra _Gambit_ by _Notching_ this.

desc: Natural armor, whether that be heavy chitin, shells, or natural plating.
